node.excerpt: The whole logic of styled-components can be described in one “feature request”: “Let’s manage CSS in js alongside with component core code”. The logic behind it is sort of obvious - it will give us the dynamic of js inside of CSS and we’ll be able to treat styling as part of component code and not store it in a separate file. The idea is promising, now let’s see what are some of the edge cases. And why is that? Because nothing is ideal in the world.
